LanguageData.SlimeGlob.label: slime glob
LanguageData.SlimeGlob.description: Glob extracted from a slain slime creature, used in mutagen recipes.
LanguageData.SlimeGel.label: slime gel
LanguageData.SlimeGel.description: Gel like fluid extracted from a living slime, has a few uses in the lab or can be cooked into a very nutritious paste.
LanguageData.SlimePaste.label: slime paste
LanguageData.SlimePaste.description: Nutritious paste made from slime gel, not very tasty alone but the flavor cooks into meals quite well.
